nodes.name: Markov Decision Process
nodes.solves: Provides a unified mathematical framework for control and learning.

nodes.name: Dynamic Programming
nodes.improvement: Solves MDPs exactly with known models.
nodes.solves: Computes optimal policies when transition dynamics are known.
nodes.limitations: Requires full model and state enumeration.

nodes.name: Monte Carlo Methods
nodes.solves: Model-free policy evaluation.

nodes.name: Temporal-Difference Learning
nodes.improvement: Bootstraps value estimates using partial trajectories.
nodes.solves: Online learning without waiting for episode termination.

nodes.name: SARSA
nodes.solves: Learns action-values while following the current policy.

nodes.name: Q-learning
nodes.improvement: Off-policy TD control using greedy bootstrap.
nodes.solves: Decouples exploration from optimal policy learning.

nodes.name: Function Approximation
nodes.improvement: Generalizes value functions beyond tabular form.
nodes.solves: Scales RL to large or continuous state spaces.

nodes.name: Deep Q-Network
nodes.improvement: Neural Q-functions with replay and target networks.
nodes.solves: Stabilizes Q-learning with function approximation.

nodes.name: Double DQN
nodes.solves: Reduces overestimation bias in Q-learning.

nodes.name: Dueling Networks
nodes.solves: Improves learning efficiency in states with similar actions.

nodes.name: Distributional RL
nodes.improvement: Models return distributions instead of expectations.
nodes.solves: Captures risk and uncertainty in value estimation.

nodes.name: REINFORCE
nodes.improvement: Direct gradient ascent on expected return.
nodes.solves: Avoids value-function maximization.

nodes.name: Actor–Critic
nodes.solves: Reduces variance and improves convergence.

nodes.name: Natural Policy Gradient
nodes.solves: Makes policy updates invariant to parameterization.

nodes.name: Trust Region Policy Optimization
nodes.solves: Prevents catastrophic policy collapse.

nodes.name: Proximal Policy Optimization
nodes.solves: Simplifies TRPO while retaining stability.

nodes.name: Maximum Entropy RL
nodes.solves: Encourages robust exploration.

nodes.name: Soft Actor-Critic
nodes.solves: Stable learning in continuous, high-dimensional control.

nodes.name: RL from Human Feedback
nodes.improvement: Optimizes policies using learned reward models.
nodes.solves: Aligns language models with human preferences.

nodes.name: Group Relative Policy Optimization
nodes.solves: Eliminates unstable value estimation in large models.
